mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_CART (ID, MEMBER_ID, PRODUCT_ID) VALUES(CART_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBC.ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDRESS, MEMBER_SMS, MEMBER_EMAILCHECK, PRODUCT_ID , PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PRODUCT_CODE, PRODUCT_DATE, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_TYPE, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_NAME, PRODUCT_EDIT_DATE, PRODUCT_DETAIL, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE1, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE2, PRODUCT_SUB_IMAGE3 FROM TBL_CART TBC JOIN TBL_MEMBER TBM ON TBC.MEMBER_ID = TBM.ID JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TBP ON TBC.PRODUCT_ID = TBP.ID ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM( SELECT TP.ID FROM TBL_CART TC JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TC.PRODUCT_ID = TP.ID )TP WHERE TP.ID = #{productId}
